images.description: Levi playing Satyavan in the opera "Savitri" by Gustav Holst. In this scene, Satyavan is warning off whomever is lurking in the forest.
Levi with his wife, Jackie, in Maui.
Levi designed and built a four-burner, propane-powered forge for his father.
Levi playing Va&#353ek in the opera "The Bartered Bride" by Bedřich Smetana. In this scene, Vašek, a stuttering fool, is musing about about his forthcoming arranged marriage.
Levi and Jackie at their wedding.
Levi leading a campfire song about peeling a banana. He was a counselor and Life Guard at Camp Hahobas, a Boy Scout summer camp.
Levi at the University of Washington's Friday Harbor Laboratories on San Juan Island.
